column4: and if installing from source, make a .deb with checkinstall to avoid a headache later

got that already safes a lot of trouble and tyler_d I really don't suspect that source would make that much of a difference to the repo, both would be compiled similar, it just seems like more work that is not needed unless your certain that is the problem
indeed.  I just like to make sure everyone knows about checkinstall
true say everyone should know but I have had some problems with a few packages maybe it was just the options I chose
